thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 7 of 472
thread.title: Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text: I would definitely recommend ClearBags to anyone and everyone that I know. I, myself will be ordering from them for years to come. I am a crafter and I enjoy making little things to give as gifts. I also make little treats for my great-niece and great-nephew to give out at every holiday to their classmates and teachers. It's all about making people happy. ClearBags makes me happy and gives me the tools to make that happen. I love them.
